name: Leaf from the Marienleben
description: Leaf from the Marienleben; Unknown, Brother Philipp; Bavaria, Germany; about 1330 - 1350; Pen and black ink, tempera colors, and gold leaf on parchment; Leaf: 32.5 × 22.1 cm (12 13/16 × 8 11/16 in.); Ms. Ludwig XIII 2; J. Paul Getty Museum, Los Angeles, California
title: Leaf from the Marienleben
medium: Pen and black ink, tempera colors, and gold leaf on parchment
